add.description:
add    rd, rs, rt
rd = rs + rt

addu.description:
addu    rd, rs, rt
rd = rs + rt

addi.description:
addi    rd, rs, imm
rd = rs + Sign-Extended-Immeditate

addiu.description:
addiu    rd, rs, imm
rd = rs + Sign-Extended-Immeditate

and.description:
and    rd, rs, rt
rd = rs & rt

andi.description:
andi    rd, rs, rt
rd = rs & Zero-Extended-Immeditate

clo.description:
clo	rd, rs
Count the number of leading ones in the word in the register rs and put the result into register rd

clz.description:
clz	rd, rs
Count the number of leading zeros in the word in the register rs and put the result into register rd

div.description:
div	rs, rt
Divide register rs by register rt,Leave the quotient in register lo and the remainder in register hi

div-pseudo.description:
div	rdest, rsrc1, src2
Put the quotient of the register rsrc1 and src2 into register rdest

divu.description:
divu	rs, rt
Divide register rs by register rt,Leave the quotient in register lo and the remainder in register hi

divu-pseudo.description:
divu	rdest, rsrc1, src2
Put the quotient of the register rsrc1 and src2 into register rdest

mult.description:
mult	rs, rt
Multiply rgeister rs and rt,Leave the low-order word of the product in register lo and the high-order word in register hi

multu.description:
multu	rs, rt
Multiply rgeister rs and rt,Leave the low-order word of the product in register lo and the high-order word in register hi

mul.description:
mul	rd, rs, rt
Put the low-order 32 bits of the product of rs ans rt into register rd

mulo.description:
mulo	rdest,rsrc1,src1
Put the low-order 32 bits of the product of rsrc1 ans src2 into register rdest

mulou.description:
mulou	rdest, rsrc1, src2
Put the low-order 32 bits of the product of rsrc1 ans src2 into register rdest

madd.description:
madd	rs, rt
Multiply register rs and rt and add the resulting 64-bit product to the 64-bit value in the concatenated registers lo and hi

maddu.description:
madd	rs, rt
Multiply register rs and rt and add the resulting 64-bit product to the 64-bit value in the concatenated registers lo and hi

msub.description:
msub	rs, rt
Multiply register rs and rt and subtract the resulting 64-bit product to the 64-bit value in the concatenated registers lo and hi

neg.description:
neg	rdest, rsrc
Put the negative of rsrc into register rdest

negu.description:
negu	rdest, rsrc
Put the negative of rsrc into register rdest

nor.description:
nor	rd, rs, rt
Put the logical NOR of registers rs and rt into register rd

not.description:
not	rdest, rsrc
Put the bitwise logical negation of register rsrc into register rdest

or.description:
or	rd, rs, rt
Put the logical OR of register rs and rt into register rd

ori.description:
ori	rt, rs, imm
Put the logical OR of register rs and the zero-extended immediate into register rt

rem.descripition:
rem	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Put the reminder of register rsrc1 divided by register rsrc2 into register rdest

remu.descripition:
remu	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Put the reminder of register rsrc1 divided by register rsrc2 into register rdest

sll.descripition:
sll	rd, rt, shamt
Shift register rt left by the distance indicate by immediate shamt and put the result in register rd

sllv.descriptiion:
sllv	rd, rt, rs
Shift register rt left by the distance indicate by register rs and put the result in register rd

lui.descripition:
lui	rt,imm
Load the lower halfword of the immediate imm into the upper halfword of register rt

li.descripition:
li	rdest, imm
Move the immediate into register rdest

slt.descripition:
slt	rd, rs, rt
Set register rd to 1 if regsiter rs is less than rt, and to 0 otherwise

sltu.descripition:
sltu	rd, rs, rt
Set register rd to 1 if register rs is less than rt

slti.descripition:
slti	rt, rs, imm
Set register rt to 1 if register rs is less than the sign-extended immediate,and to 0 otherwise

sltiu.descripition:
sltiu	rt, rs, imm
Set register rt to 1 if register rs is less than the sign-extended immediate,and to 0 otherwise

seq.descripition:
seq	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if register rsrc1 equals rsrc2,and to 0 otherwise

sge.descripition:
sge	rdest, rsrc1, resrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if regsiter rsrc1 is greater than or equal to rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sgeu.descripition:
sgeu	rdest, rsrc1, resrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if regsiter rsrc1 is greater than or equal to rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sgt.descripition:
sgt	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if rsrc1 is greater than rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sgtu.descripition:
sgtu	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if rsrc1 is greater than rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sle.descripition:
sle	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if rsrc1 is less than or equal to rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sleu.descripition:
sleu	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if rsrc1 is less than or equal to rsrc2, and to 0 otherwise

sne.descripition:
sne	rdest, rsrc1, rsrc2
Set register rdest to 1 if rsrc1 is not equal to rsrc2,and to 0 otherwise

b.descripition:
b	label
Unconditionally branch to the instruction at the label

bclf.descripition:
bclf	cc, label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if the floating-point coprocessor's condition flag numbered cc is false

bclt.descripition:
bclt	cc, label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if the floating-point coprocessor's condition flag numbered cc is true

beq.descripition:
beq	rs, rt ,label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs equals rt

bgez.descripition:
bgez	rs,label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs is greater than or equals to 0

bgezal.descripition:
bgez	rs,label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs is greater than or equals to 0, Save the address of the next instruction in register 31($ra)

bgtz.descripition:
bgtz	rs, label
Conditionally branch the number of instruction specified by the offset if register rs is greater than 0

blez.descripition:
blez	rs,label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs is less than or equals to 0

bltzal.descripition:
blez	rs,label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs is less than 0, Save the address of the next instruction in register 31($ra)

bltz.descripition:
bltz	rs, label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions specified by the offset if register rs is less than 0

bne.descripition:
bne	rs, rt, label
Conditionally branch the number of instructions sprcified by the offset if register rs is not equal to rt

beqz.descripition:
beqz	rsrc, label
Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if rsrc equals 0

bge.descripition:
bge	rsrc1, rsrc2, label
Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is greater than or equal to rsrc2

bgeu.descripition:
bgeu	rsrc1, rsrc2, label
Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is greater than or equal to rsrc2

bgt.descripition:
bgt	rsrc1, src2, label
Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is greater than src2

bgtu.descripition:
bgtu	rsrc1, src2, label
Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is greater than src2

ble.descripition: ble	rsrc1, src2, label Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is less than or equal to src2

bleu.descripition: bleu	rsrc1, src2, label Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is less than or equal to src2

blt.descripition: ble	rsrc1, rsrc2, label Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is less than rsrc2

body: bltu	rsrc1, rsrc2, label Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc1 is less than rsrc2

bnez.descripition: Conditionally branch to the instruction at the label if register rsrc is not equal to 0

j.descripition:
j	target
Uncondition jump to the instruction at target

jal.descripition:
jal	target
Unconditionallt jump to the instruction at target,Save the address of next instruction in the register 31($ra)

jalr.descripition:
jalr	rs, rd
Unconditionally jump to the instruction whose address is in register rs,Save the address of next instruction in register rd

jr.descripition:
jr	rs
Unconditionally jump to the instruction whose address is in register rs

eret.descripition: Set the EXL bit in coprocess 0's Status register to 0 and return the instruction pointed to by coprocess o's EPC register

syscall.descripition:
syscall
Load syscall call code to regsiter 2($v0) and ararguments to register 4-7($a0-$a3),to use operating system-like services
